text: Bernard Tchoullouyan (12 April 1953 â€” 6 January 2019) was a French former judoka. He won a world title in 1981 and an Olympic bronze medal in 1980. He was born in Marseille, France. Tchoullouyan died on 6 January 2019 from a heart attack, at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French judoka Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Sportspeople from Marseille
title: Bernard Tchoullouyan
